response.overview: A town—where everyone seems to be named Johnson—stands in the way of the railroad. In order to grab their land, robber baron Hedley Lamarr sends his henchmen to make life in the town unbearable. After the sheriff is killed, the town demands a new sheriff from the Governor, so Hedley convinces him to send the town the first black sheriff in the west.
response.tagline: ...or never give a saga an even break!
response.title: Blazing Saddles

cast.name: Mel Brooks
cast.character: Governor William J. Le Petomane / Indian Chief

results.name: Movie Clip - A New Sheriff In Town
Mel Brooks calls Madeline Kahn the single best comedian that ever lived.
